timeline.bodyText: Hi, Why have you added scope: Namespaced in CustomResource's body? Is this intentional?
timeline.author: rohanKanojia

replies.bodyText:
If was intentional, although not needed, because the crd is namespaced in this case and I saw it while debugging the test.
If that bothers you it can be removed...
replies.author: matthyx

replies.bodyText:
Please correct me if I'm wrong, I think this is CustomResource's body not CustomResourceDefinitions's. The test assumes that CRD already exists. We're providing whether Custom Resource is Namespaced or not in CustomResourceDefinitionContext here:

  
    
      kubernetes-client/kubernetes-tests/src/test/java/io/fabric8/kubernetes/client/mock/CustomResourceTest.java
    
    
         Line 67
      in
      f1d695d
    
    
    
    

        
          
           .withScope("Namespaced")
replies.author: rohanKanojia

replies.bodyText: Yes, indeed... my fault! I will correct that tonight.
replies.author: matthyx

replies.bodyText: @rohanKanojia done, thanks for the sharp eye!
replies.author: matthyx

replies.bodyText: Np 👍 Thanks for taking time to contribute to Fabric8 ❤️
replies.author: rohanKanojia
